metadata.title: CVE-2021-30469 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in PoDoFo 0.9.7. An use-after-free in PoDoFo::PdfVecObjects::Clear() function can cause a denial of service via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
